definition: A term commonly employed to describe the act of accepting or assuming something to be true, valid, or accurate, often based on limited evidence or without concrete proof. It is frequently used in contexts related to hypotheses, assumptions, or conjectures.

examples.german: Die Annahme des Pakets erfolgte gestern.
examples.english: The acceptance of the package was made yesterday.

examples.german: Die Annahme der Einladung wurde best√§tigt.
examples.english: The acceptance of the invitation was confirmed.

examples.german: Die Annahme des Angebots wurde abgelehnt.
examples.english: The acceptance of the offer was declined.

examples.german: Die Annahme der Bedingungen ist erforderlich.
examples.english: Acceptance of the conditions is required.
